reviews.review: Comunidade toxica mas jogo muito bom, se tiver paciencia se torna um puta joga de teamplays

Disregard the hours I have on this game, I've played this game for a good deal of my life and its always been fun aside from some toxic people in competitive, this game has always found a way to be fun and wont stop being like that for many years (I played this game on different accounts)

Until valve figures out a way to actually get rid of the hackers rather than just banning their account and have them repeatedly making new accounts considering the game is free. Competitive is fun as shit when its an honest game but always knowing the possibility someone could just be cheating is annoying with how wide it is and how self aware the community is.
yeah, its a good game, and srew you ERIK.

It was more enjoyable when the game was paid. After Volvo's f2p update, things went down the drain. Cheaters, bad players, toxic etc etc. Well done, Valve.
F2P CS:GO was a mistake. People buying boosted accounts with "13/16 Years of Service" and cheap undetectable cheats everywhere. When the game was paid VAC didn't work, imagine now.
